: : Kup : : 
Kup: Haha, glad that you guys could make it. Settle down though. I'll explain what's going on when the others arrive. 
Kup then recieved Rodimus' message. 
Kup(via commlink): I read you, lad, no problem. Good luck with whatever it is. I'll talk to you later. 
 "Nic <wingedwarrior41@...>" <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote: Owlhawk finally came out of the CR chamber after a long rejuvenative
sleep. He activated his commline.

Owlhawk: I got it Kup. I'll be there in a breeze.

He goes right to the briefing room.

Ragnar: Roger, wilco. Was there not also a tech named Flicker? I think
he could help if we bring in heavy weapons.

He too soon appeared in the room.

Owlhawk: Glad to see you're all okay. What'd I miss? What's the plan?
Can we go bust some Vok?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000 <airly2002@h...>"
<airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Windlord
> 
> "I'll be with you2 assured Windlord
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>" 
> <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > Empath::
> > 
> > "Pardon my mistrust, but ..."  As Empath reaches for the Soul Orb, 
> it 
> > suddenly flies to her hands.  "Funny, I've never been able to do 
> that 
> > before."  She shakes her head and follows Windlord, tucking the 
> Orb 
> > away alongside the one already in her chest compartment.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000 <airly2002@h...>" 
> > <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > Windlord:
> > > 
> > > "Yes Kup, I'm going"Said Windlord and Looking at Emphath "Come, 
> > love 
> > > they are waitting us"
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > 
> > > > : : Kup : :
> > > > Kup(via commlink): Great Windlord. Since Aerotaur has pulled 
> out, 
> > > Empath can take his place on this mission.
> > > >  "airly2000 <airly2002@h...>" <airly2002@h...> 
> wrote:OOC:Scratch 
> > > my last post wiht Windlord. I haven't read this, so I'll 
> > > > correct it.
> > > >

> > > > 
> > > > WIndlord opened his commlink "Windlord, reporting... I'm ready 
> to 
> > > > work"and looking to Emphath "Come, love, we leave this in the 
> > safe 
> > > > box and next we go to the meeting"
> > > >
